description: A hidden community between Level 5 and Level 6 of Impel Down, serving as a paradise for those who embrace gender fluidity and freedom of expression.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Treatment Begins
keyEvents.description: The Newkama Land community supports Ivankov as he treats Luffy.

goals: Support freedom of identity and expression
significance: Represents acceptance and freedom within the confines of the world's most secure prison

description: A powerful organization opposed to the World Government, seeking to bring about revolutionary change.

keyEvents.title: Ivankov Helps Luffy
keyEvents.description: Revolutionary Army Commander Ivankov uses his powers to save Luffy.

significance: One of the major opposing forces to the World Government
